lust.question: Did I reduce others to mere objects, using them for my own purposes rather than treating them with dignity and respect?
lust.description: While not sexual in nature, this sin is still a form of lust in that it objectifies others who are created in God's image and possesses inherent dignity,

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the good things in my life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: including your family and career blessings
autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the good things in your life, including your family and career blessings, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the benefits of your career advancement, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I ever felt envious of my friends' successes, wishing they wouldn't be so blessed?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

envy.question: Have I secretly resented others' good fortune, wishing it was mine instead?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in expressing myself through words, speaking to others with language that lacked respect for their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

with family members or close friends
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and use words that were unbecoming or demeaning to others, especially in interactions with family members or close friends?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially during family gatherings or special occasions?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking, leading to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures that compromised my commitment to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I engaged in excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over my family's needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: over meeting my family 's essential needs
prodigality.question: Have I excessively prioritized spending on myself or frivolous activities over meeting my family's essential needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true, within conversations at social gatherings, online forums, or while spending time with family and friends?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

with friends or acquaintances confidential information about others
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing with friends or acquaintances confidential information about others, even if what was shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did you engage in work on a Sunday, even though it was not necessary?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

anger.question: Have I nursed anger or held onto feelings of rage in my relationships, rather than seeking reconciliation when conflicts arose?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
